    1: from __future__ import annotations
    2: from typing import Any
    3: import numpy as np
    4: 
    5: AR_LIKE_b = [[True, True], [True, True]]
    6: AR_LIKE_i = [[1, 2], [3, 4]]
    7: AR_LIKE_f = [[1.0, 2.0], [3.0, 4.0]]
    8: AR_LIKE_U = [["1", "2"], ["3", "4"]]
    9: 
   10: AR_i8: np.ndarray[Any, np.dtype[np.int64]] = np.array(AR_LIKE_i, dtype=np.int64)
   11: 
   12: np.ndenumerate(AR_i8)
   13: np.ndenumerate(AR_LIKE_f)
   14: np.ndenumerate(AR_LIKE_U)
   15: 
   16: next(np.ndenumerate(AR_i8))
   17: next(np.ndenumerate(AR_LIKE_f))
   18: next(np.ndenumerate(AR_LIKE_U))
   19: 
   20: iter(np.ndenumerate(AR_i8))
   21: iter(np.ndenumerate(AR_LIKE_f))
   22: iter(np.ndenumerate(AR_LIKE_U))
   23: 
   24: iter(np.ndindex(1, 2, 3))
   25: next(np.ndindex(1, 2, 3))
   26: 
   27: np.unravel_index([22, 41, 37], (7, 6))
   28: np.unravel_index([31, 41, 13], (7, 6), order='F')
   29: np.unravel_index(1621, (6, 7, 8, 9))
   30: 
   31: np.ravel_multi_index(AR_LIKE_i, (7, 6))
   32: np.ravel_multi_index(AR_LIKE_i, (7, 6), order='F')
   33: np.ravel_multi_index(AR_LIKE_i, (4, 6), mode='clip')
   34: np.ravel_multi_index(AR_LIKE_i, (4, 4), mode=('clip', 'wrap'))
   35: np.ravel_multi_index((3, 1, 4, 1), (6, 7, 8, 9))
   36: 
   37: np.mgrid[1:1:2]
   38: np.mgrid[1:1:2, None:10]
   39: 
   40: np.ogrid[1:1:2]
   41: np.ogrid[1:1:2, None:10]
   42: 
   43: np.index_exp[0:1]
   44: np.index_exp[0:1, None:3]
   45: np.index_exp[0, 0:1, ..., [0, 1, 3]]
   46: 
   47: np.s_[0:1]
   48: np.s_[0:1, None:3]
   49: np.s_[0, 0:1, ..., [0, 1, 3]]
   50: 
   51: np.ix_(AR_LIKE_b[0])
   52: np.ix_(AR_LIKE_i[0], AR_LIKE_f[0])
   53: np.ix_(AR_i8[0])
   54: 
   55: np.fill_diagonal(AR_i8, 5)
   56: 
   57: np.diag_indices(4)
   58: np.diag_indices(2, 3)
   59: 
   60: np.diag_indices_from(AR_i8)
